reasoning: Metastatic esophageal carcinoma represents late-stage disease; ~40-50% of esophageal cancers present with metastatic spread at diagnosis. Global esophageal cancer incidence approximately 10-15 per 100k, with ~40-50% metastatic at presentation yields ~4-5 per 100k. Data limited to advanced stage estimates; no specific registry data for metastatic-only cases.
